title: Field names are case-sensitive
description:
If a field 'name' is specified explicitly, then it is case-sensitive. This used to be case-insensitive in 1.3 release.

Refer to discussion on solr-user at http://markmail.org/message/a73c5fjfheg552vu

comments.author: Shalin Shekhar Mangar
comments.content:
Attached patch to fix this issue. Added tests for verification.

I'll commit this shortly.
